revised_title: Examination of Urine Composition and Excretion of Sulphur and Phosphorus
tldr: The author conducted experiments to understand the composition of urine and the excretion of sulfur and phosphorus by the kidneys. They discovered that the kidneys excrete a significant amount of sulfur and phosphorus in an unoxidized state. The author also found that in cases of diabetes, the amount of unoxidized sulfur in urine is higher than in healthy individuals. Further research is needed to determine the compounds containing these elements in urine.
